Articles.Content:
Got something for ya guys

I wanted to show off some more images of it, also with removed skirt, but it was already very hard to take those **screenshots** of it! Originally I wanted to render something, but it just keeps crashing. And even without the want to render this, only screenshotting is hard, it crashed at last 3 or 4 times before I was able to take those two images!

I am using the "Mask" Tool for now, which hides the parts where I apply that modifier, in order to work on this. I will need to have an individual scene for every part now which I make for this, otherwise it will just keep crashing. My laptop is just too weak for things like this, I am doing all this stuff on a Lenovo Thinkpad E531, but with upgraded RAM (12GB). I'll really need a new one, even if this thing is not old at all.

OOO, OOO, OOO. I know what THAT is:) Keep it up!!!

Edited October 7, 2015 by StoryMusgrave

OOO, OOO, OOO. I know what THAT is:)

Yeah.

As I said, I really need to figure out how I should continue, splitting every part of it up in a different scene would be a solution, but an annoying one. Maybe I've overdone it a bit. I don't know, but I wanted to make that thing highly realistic...
"Roger, 0-G and I feel fine"
Maybe make the whole thing as a basic model, then split it up to do details??? But what do I know.

"Roger, 0-G and I feel fine"

Exactly, that one. Though I will concentrate on Atlas II first, and then on that Mercury, Agena and whatsoever-stuff.

Maybe make the whole thing as a basic model, then split it up to do details??? But what do I know.

That would be an option too, but sometimes those details go into the main model, like you see at the skirt, and then it gets difficult. I have to deal with this somehow, I am optimistic that I'll get everything working, somehow.

Anyway, I am going to play Kerbal now, recreating a nice Falcon 9 (1.2) plus RTLS.

Edited October 7, 2015 by Kartoffelkuchen
Are there configs for RealPlume & RealFuels? I was able to add Kerosene/LOX to the Delta V but obviously could not access the engine UI.

When you downloaded RO then there should be configs for it (it's Atlas V btw. ).

Had a productive phase this evening, Delta III components are DONE. I just need to fine-tune the UV maps and positions of the single objects and then do the Unity stuff + configs. Images soon.

sounds awesome so far kart cant wait~!!! also I was talking to someone today who worked on atlas II and III's so I have TONS of info

Edited October 11, 2015 by Tristonwilson12

Yeha!

This was the fastest development phase I've ever had. I worked much more efficient than the last times, ok, I didn't have to make the upper stage, noonespecial will do that, but anyway, all in all it took me only 2 days to get this done. Pretty cool eh?
Looks amazing!

Yeha!

http://i.imgur.com/JHRZ1jh.png

http://i.imgur.com/VbHGOsH.png

http://i.imgur.com/6FCcB03.png

This was the fastest development phase I've ever had. I worked much more efficient than the last times, ok, I didn't have to make the upper stage, noonespecial will do that, but anyway, all in all it took me only 2 days to get this done. Pretty cool eh?

It looks amazing buddy! I will discontinue mine immediately. Any predictions as to when you will release it?
Yippee! DIII.
I,m getting quite a bit of lag while using the falcon 1, and i notice its coming from the engine flame. Any reason for this?

I don't think it comes from the engine flame mahboi18. You have probably enavled Aero FX, and with all the dmodelled details on Falcon 1 things are getting slow. I've removed those details and packed them on the normal map for the next update, so that should be fixed. It also decreases the overall sige of the model. Merlin engine is retextured and now supports (I recommend) Texture Replacer, to give it a shiny, reflective, realistic look.

Thank you all for the very positive ferdback! :]

@liquid: I can't really say, I'll get the DCSS from noonespecial, but he's not finished yet with it. I can get all my things done by the end of this week, and once I got the stage it should only take one or two more days.

I've made a provisional solution for our DCSS problem, I've made my own one. Nothing special, very basic stuff.

The engine model is from noonespecial, I just made the extension. Release now as soon as possible, the DCSS will be of course replaced with the one from noonespecial when he releases his.

Nice Did you animate the nozzle skirt extention? If so, you could use BDAnimationModules in order to have the skirt auto-extend once the engine is ignited. That is what I did for my new RL10-B-2 model, as well as for the new Vinci engine.
this might be a dumb question, but where does the Configs folder in the download go? Or do i put the rescaled.cfg somwhere?

Thanks liquid, tried that, works perfectly! I knew there was such a plugin, I just forgot the name of it! +Rep my friend!

@ftoc_tx: Pit it anywhere in your GameData folder, it doesn't matter.
As always, looks great my friend hey I think I sent you a PM this morning?? Lol can't remember

Hey guys, been productive again and completely remade the DCSS:

(Yes, Sketchfab has some problems with the model, which are not existent in Blender)

The model is UV unwrapped now, and I will try to throw some good textures on it now! The DCSS is much more modular in comparison to my last one, LOX tank, Truss section, grid, RCS and LH2 Tank are now seperated, which should also make balancing a bit easier, especially correct masses. It also includes a fully functional flight computer model now, witch wiring etc, which will be its own part and have kOS and RemoteTech support. If there's anything else a flight computer needs to have plugin-wise, let me know and I'll add it to the list!

Edited October 16, 2015 by Kartoffelkuchen

Hey guys, been productive again and completely remade the DCSS:

(Yes, Sketchfab has some problems with the model, which are not existent in Blender)

The model is UV unwrapped now, and I will try to throw some good textures on it now!

Kartoffelkuchen + weekend = amazingness! Lookin' really good buddy!
Thanks man! :]
Oh getting excited more and more. Kk and liquid both with releases imminent....insert George takei 'oh my' here.
HYPE. Cannot wait to add this to my RO game.
